alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:25AM EDT until April 01 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MONROE AND WAYNE COUNTIES... At 125 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Livonia to Taylor to near Flat Rock, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Wyandotte around 130 AM EDT. Detroit and Dearborn around 135 AM EDT. Downtown Detroit and Belle Isle around 140 AM EDT. Grosse Pointe around 145 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Newport, Melvindale, Gibraltar, New Boston, Rockwood, Harper Woods, Westland, Grosse Pointe Shores, Ecorse and Scofield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
